tool_description: Music data APIs by Cuttime Inc. allow you to find event by GEO location, receive event list by specific venue, get historical information about events to do analysis, get information about variety of artists, artist events, top tracks, artist-brands, affinity.
name: Cuttime
title: Cuttime

api_list.name: /venues/{venue_id}/events
api_list.description: Returns event list with performer artists by venue id

api_list.name: /lyrics/artists
api_list.description: This method returns list of artists matched by lyrics search request

api_list.name: /lyrics/songs
api_list.description: This method returns list of songs matched by lyrics search request

api_list.name: /brands/{brand_id}/band-brand-affinities-score
/artists/{artist_id}/brand-affinities
/artists
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cuttime1.p.rapidapi.com/artists"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cuttime1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
